entry.title: Men Of The Sea
entry.content:
It’s the salty seas captain!

‘Arggg ‘me arties and come in to the development blog for this ‘ere pirate sim a couple’o salty dogs are putting together. The idea of Sea-men ‘men of the sea’ is quite simple, to make the finest pirate sim in all the land!

Features

  • Ultra hi-rez graphix featuring full text sea animations warning may induce realistic nausia.
  • A world like no other for you to claim as ‘yer own.
  • Highly accurate sea physics engine and cannon-tec system.
  • Sophisticated AI including NPC’s that you’ll want to drink grog with.
